i:doc.i:body:
VICTINA SYSTEMS INTERNATIONAL is looking for COBOL/UNISYS 2200 programmers.
Victina is an Austin/Dallas based Information Systems Consulting Company. We specialize in working with both our employees and customers for maximum satisfaction.
LOCATION: Austin, Texas.
Several Positions available
REQUIRED: -Unisys 2200 -COBOL
Please email resumes to (victina01@aol.com)
Victina Systems International 3532 Bee Caves Road, Suite 202 Austin, Texas 78746
Fax: (512) 327-1651
VICTINA SYSTEMS INT'L
